issue.description:
The 'role' attribute on the certification_assignment entity is being classified. However, the attribute is derived from object_role. So should the mapping just be a classification of the role attribute on certification_assignment
applied_attribute_classification_assignment {applied_attribute_classification_assignment <= attribute_classification_assignment attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name = 'role'} applied_attribute_classification_assignment.items[i] = classified_attribute_select classified_attribute_select *> ap239_mri_classified_attribute_select ap239_mri_classified_attribute_select = certification_assignment
or should it be a classification of the name attribute on the object_role entity?
applied_attribute_classification_assignment {applied_attribute_classification_assignment <= attribute_classification_assignment attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name = 'name'} applied_attribute_classification_assignment.items[i] = classified_attribute_select classified_attribute_select *> ap239_mri_classified_attribute_select ap239_mri_classified_attribute_select = object_role object_role <- role.certification_assignment
